title: Saksham Drone
summary: A reliable industrial drone designed for surveying and inspection.
description: Saksham is a rugged industrial quadcopter designed for mapping, inspection and payload delivery in commercial environments. It features modular payload bays, safety-first avionics and a configurable autopilot.

title: LED Flying Screen Display
summary: Aerial LED display system for events and installations.
description: An integrated aerial display platform combining a stabilized LED matrix with flight-capable mounting. Designed for short-duration events and media displays.

title: Modular Robotics Kit
summary: Education-focused robotics kits for universities and labs.
description: A modular kit for learning embedded systems, perception and control. Includes sensors, actuators and curriculum modules for instructors.
